segments.text: Hi , Nicole . Did you have a good weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . But I feel tired today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , on Saturday I cleaned the house and played tennis . Then on Sunday I hiked in the country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I bet you studied , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I studied on Sunday evening . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I didn't clean the house and I didn't study . I stayed in bed and watched TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like fun , but did you exercise ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sort of . I played golf on my computer !
segments.speaker: S1
